body: Thanks for the report and backtrace.  Fixing now.
Please also note that this is a sign that Sidekiq is not shutting down properly.  Is it crashing?

issue.title: Internal Server Error when opening busy

repository.name: sidekiq
repository.description: Simple, efficient background processing for Ruby

issue.body:
@mperham 

When I visit /sidekiq/busy I get Internal Server Error.

The issue was closed https://github.com/mperham/sidekiq/issues/1537 
but I guess needs to be rechecked.

I am using:
Rails 3.2.17
Ruby 2.0.0
Redis-Server 2.4.16

Below is the log ...
